member.name: M:CefSharp.WinForms.Internals.DefaultFocusHandler.OnGotFocus
member.remarks: Try to avoid needing to override this logic in a subclass. The implementation in DefaultFocusHandler relies on very detailed behavior of how WinForms and Windows interact during window activation.

member.name: M:CefSharp.WinForms.Internals.ControlExtensions.InvokeOnUiThreadIfRequired(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Action)
member.summary: Executes the Action asynchronously on the UI thread, does not block execution on the calling thread.
member.param: the control for which the update is required
action to be performed on the control

member.name: M:CefSharp.WinForms.Internals.ControlExtensions.IsActiveControl(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Returns whether the supplied control is the currently active control.

member.name: F:CefSharp.WinForms.Internals.ParentFormMessageInterceptor.isMoving
member.summary: Keep track of whether a move is in progress.

member.name: F:CefSharp.WinForms.Internals.ParentFormMessageInterceptor.movingRectangle
member.summary: Used to determine the coordinates involved in the move

member.name: M:CefSharp.WinForms.Internals.ParentFormMessageInterceptor.RefindParentForm
member.summary: Call to force refinding of the parent Form. (i.e. top level window that owns the ChromiumWebBrowserControl)

member.name: M:CefSharp.WinForms.Internals.ParentFormMessageInterceptor.ParentParentChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Adjust the form to listen to if the ChromiumWebBrowserControl's parent changes.
member.param: The ChromiumWebBrowser whose parent has changed.

member.name: M:CefSharp.WinForms.ChromiumWebBrowser.SetFocus(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tell the browser to acquire/release focus.

member.name: P:CefSharp.WinForms.ChromiumWebBrowser.IsActivating
member.summary: Set to true while handing an activating WM_ACTIVATE message. MUST ONLY be cleared by DefaultFocusHandler.

member.name: P:CefSharp.WinForms.ChromiumWebBrowser.FocusHandler
member.remarks: If you need customized focus handling behavior for WinForms, the suggested best practice would be to inherit from DefaultFocusHandler and try to avoid needing to override the logic in OnGotFocus. The implementation in DefaultFocusHandler relies on very detailed behavior of how WinForms and Windows interact during window activation.

member.name: P:CefSharp.WinForms.ChromiumWebBrowser.Focused
member.summary: Manually implement Focused because cef does not implement it.
member.remarks: This is also how the Microsoft's WebBrowserControl implements the Focused property.
